chunks.content: Le Minh Xuan Commune, Binh Chanh District, HCM City

- HTML, CSS, SASS/SCSS.
- Bootstrap, Material-UI.
- jQWidgets, DevExtreme.
- jQuery, Javascript, TypeScript.
- AngularJs, ReactJs, Redux, Redux-Thunk.
- C#, NodeJs.
- SQL Server, MySQL.
- Open University HCMC, Vietnam, 2009 - 2013 Bachelor of Computer Science.

- Have motivation and goals to constantly develop skills and long-term career orientation. Sociable, enthusiastic, and ready to learn new technology.
- Participate in DMS software development, and solve the problem of goods distribution (jQuery, C#, SQL server).
- Hospital Information System Development (Javascript, AngularJs, ReactJs, NodeJs).
- Building software to manage export product information. (C#)

- Built-in facial recognition function for AI timekeeping.
- Integrate store recognition function for employees to come to the store to sell with AI, replacing GPS.
- Integrate product brand recognition function, and count the number of products in images with AI.
- Develop the function of running automatic image scoring according to promotions.
- Database design interface and functions development for promotions.
- Develop reports as required by departments.

- Analyze requirements, research, and develop new features.
- Develop web applications with Javascript, Bootstrap, and jQWidgets.
- Maintain functions that already exist.
- Tracking performance, improving connection speed, customizing SQL statements to improve query database performance.

- Analyze requirements, research and develop new features.
- Develop features and fix bugs, resolve impediments.
- Develop interface web applications with Javascript, ReactJs, Bootstrap, Material UI.

- Booking movie:
- Feature:
- Get information movies, schedule movies by theaters. theaters, details box office, sign up, login, validation form.
- Change information profile, change password, get history booking, CRUD movies.

Apr 2015 - Apr 2020
- Evaluate product code samples before ordering promotions, analysis of inventories, operational costs of the store to enter profitable goods.
- Business monitoring, inventories, program proposals to increase revenue.
- Contract and finance management with partners.
- Training store manager to deploy programs, use the software and support sales resolve issues related to stores.

Oct 2013 - Apr 2015
- Create domains, decentralize users, centrally manage server data.
- Manage equipment, install software for departments.
- Deploy product management software - Winform Application.
- Analysis of operational processes: obtaining customer requirements, designing databases.
- Implement features to create, read, update, delete, search for product information for departments to use,
Apr 2020 - Sep 2020

metadata.section: Quang Minh Cooperative IT helpdesk & Software Developer
